participant_1.name: Chance
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and optimistic, Chance is always ready to share his experiences and engage in conversations.
participant_1.background: My father is in the army. I love playing softball. I recently was fired and had to get a new job. I work in the insurance business.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Driven and nurturing, Jordan balances her professional tennis career with her family life, always looking forward to new challenges.
participant_2.background: I'm a professional tennis player. I live in a three storey house. My family is continuously growing. I am married to a doctor.

content.text: I live with my family in 3 story house
By the way I’m a married doctor
